subject: Programming
title: The Y2K Panic
description: Learn The Y2K Panic in one minute.

hook.text: As midnight approached on January 1, 2000, the world held its breath.

buildup.text: Old programs stored years as two digits. The year 2000 would register as 1900.

discovery.text: Banks, power grids, and hospitals all ran code written decades earlier with this shortcut.

twist.text: Governments spent over $300 billion fixing Y2K bugs. When midnight hit, almost nothing broke.

climax.text: Critics called it a hoax. Engineers knew the fix worked because they spent years applying it.

punchline.text: The disaster that didn't happen was the fix working.

quiz.question: How much was spent globally to fix Y2K bugs?
